import { useTranslation } from "react-i18next"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const TopMenu = () => { const {i18n } = useTranslation(); const changeLanguage = (lng) => { i18n.changeLanguage(lng); }; return (
{t('appTitle ')}
    • {t('signIn')}

); }; export default TopMenu;
